Introduction

Taehwan is a South Korean singer under KLAP Entertainment. He is the leader of the boy group VANNER. He is best known for being a contestant on the reality survival show Build Up : Vocal Boy Group Survivor.

He made his solo debut on January 3, 2022, with the digital single "Frozen".

Taehwan disclosed that he was exempted from serving in the military because he was designated as the only source of income for his home after his father passed away in 2017 due to an accident.
